song.title: The Nails in Your Hands
song.lyrics:
[v] . G The nails in Your hands . Em The nail in Your feet . C D They tell me how much You love me || . G The thorns on Your brow .Em They tell me how . C D You bore so much shame to love me
[P] . Bm Em And when the heavens fade away . Bm Em All Your scars will still remain . Bm Em D And forever they will say how much You love me
[C] . G Forever my love . Em Forever my heart . C D Forever my life is Yours
song.presentation: V P C V P C
